plentry.pd: Compression preference for video encoding. See .

When the video frame contains Alpha channel data, sets whether to encode and send the Alpha data to the remote end:
: Encode and send Alpha data.
: (Default) Do not encode and send Alpha data.
Compression preference for video encoding. See .

When the video frame contains alpha channel data, specifies whether to encode and send the alpha data to the remote end:
: Encode and send alpha data.
: (Default) Do not encode or send alpha data.
Compression preference for video encoding. See .

When the video frame contains Alpha channel data, sets whether to encode and send the Alpha data to the remote end:
: Encode and send the Alpha data.
: (Default) Do not encode and send the Alpha data.
Compression preference for video encoding. See .

When the video frame contains Alpha channel data, sets whether to encode and send the Alpha data to the remote end:
: Encode and send Alpha data.
: (Default) Do not encode and send Alpha data.
